title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add pancetta and cook until crispy, about 5-7 minutes.
Add minced garlic and cook for another minute.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, both cheeses, and black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Add hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed.
Toss until creamy and serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
ingredients: 1 lb boneless chicken, cut into chunks
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, and half the spices for 30 minutes.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked through. Set aside.
In a large pan, melt butter and sauté onions until golden.
Add garlic, ginger, and remaining spices. Cook for 1 minute.
Add crushed tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and cooked chicken.
Simmer for 5 minutes until sauce thickens.
Season with salt and pepper. Serve with rice or naan.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Delicious Mexican-style tacos with seasoned ground beef, fresh vegetables, and zesty sauce.
instructions: Brown ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Drain excess fat and add taco seasoning with 2/3 cup water.
Simmer for 5 minutes until sauce thickens.
Warm taco shells according to package directions.
Fill each shell with seasoned beef.
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and onions.
Serve with sour cream, cilantro, lime wedges, and hot sauce.
Enjoy immediately while shells are warm.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Fresh romaine lettuce with parmesan cheese, croutons, and classic Caesar dressing.
instructions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce, then chill in refrigerator.
For dressing, mash garlic and anchovies into a paste.
Whisk in lemon juice, Dijon mustard, and egg yolk.
Slowly drizzle in olive oil while whisking continuously.
Season dressing with salt and pepper.
Toss chilled lettuce with dressing until well coated.
Top with Parmesan cheese and croutons.
Serve immediately for best texture.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Soft and chewy homemade cookies loaded with chocolate chips.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.
In another bowl, cream butter and both sugars until fluffy.
Beat in eggs and vanilla extract.
Gradually mix in flour mixture until just combined.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes until golden brown.
Cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes, then transfer to wire rack.

title: Grilled Salmon
summary: Perfectly grilled salmon fillet with herbs and lemon, served with seasonal vegetables.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Pat salmon fillets dry and brush with olive oil.
Season with salt, pepper, paprika, and minced garlic.
Grill salmon for 4-5 minutes per side, depending on thickness.
During last 2 minutes, add lemon slices to grill.
Remove salmon when it flakes easily with a fork.
Sprinkle with fresh dill and parsley.
Serve immediately with grilled lemon slices and seasonal vegetables.
